audiointro:
Enable audio?
Press enter
to confirm.

Respawn in the
latest check-
point?
quitText:
Return to the
main menu?
You will lose
your progress!
heartDesc:
It increases
your health
by one.
itemDesc0:
It is the
default item
with no real
effect.
keyDesc:
It's pretty
fragile, but it
can be used to
open one door.
orbDesc:
It's smooth and
mysterious! Just
like Uranus!
npc0:
Hopefully you
won't find me
in the final
version.
saveGame:
Save your
progress? This
will overwrite
the old save.
openDoor:
Open the door
with an old
key? The key
will be con-
sumed.
